data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Do you believe that higher education is important for everyone, or just for some people? Provide reasons to support your opinion.
data.answer: Although some people argue that higher education is crucial for everyone, I strongly believe that it is not true as everyone has their own talents and some talents can be developed without requiring a person to obtain a tertiary qualification. For example, if a person is good at swimming and wishes to become a swimmer, what this person needs might be a good swimming program and some good support. However, if this person decides to pursue a tertiary degree instead, he might have to sacrifice many of his precious swimming practicing times with tedious paper works. As a result, this person’s plan of becoming a good swimmer can be hindered and this person’s potential would not be fully reached.
